thread.title: New Ford recalls affect 442,000 Edge, Escape, Fiesta, Fusion, and other models
thread.title_full: New Ford recalls affect 442,000 Edge, Escape, Fiesta, Fusion, and other models

author: Richard Read (feedback@highgearmedia.com)
title: New Ford recalls affect 442,000 Edge, Escape, Fiesta, Fusion, and other models
text: This morning, Ford Motor Company published details about four new recalls affecting more than 442,000 vehicles registered in North America. The vast majority were sold in the U.S. RECALL #1:2013-15 Ford Escape, Ford Fiesta ST, Ford Fusion, Ford Transit Connect UNITS AFFECTED: 230,756, including 208,584 in the U.S., 21,854 in Canada, and 318 in...
